title: Open Source Developer Support Programs | Sustain and Innovate
description: Discover Open Source Developer Support Programs that offer funding, tools, mentorship, and resources to help developers sustain and innovate within the open-source ecosystem. Learn about popular programs like GitHub Sponsors, Google Summer of Code, and more.
keywords: Open Source Developer Support Programs, GitHub Sponsors, Google Summer of Code, Open Collective, Mozilla Open Source Support, Linux Foundation, open source funding, open source mentorship, developer tools, community building
